coreAttributes.name: Renamon
coreAttributes.description: At first you think its a greater fox stood very still, but this is a battle doll, nothing more than a a golem built to fight on behalf brought to life by your arcane power, It does not measure up to elementals that demons can summon but it does take its strength from you. This this battle doll certainly looks familiar, something you watched from when you were younger???
coreAttributes.attackTooltipDescription: attack the [npc2.name] with the battle doll.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] motion towards the shadows for the doll to follow, It fades into view and [npc.verb(position)] itself by [npc.her] side, awaiting it's next command.
coreAttributes.unequipText: [npc.Name] command [npc.her] Doll to stop following, the battle doll nods and fades back into your shadow.
